attributes.action: England and Wales also vote weather or not to keep Scotland in the UK
attributes.additional_details: I think most people in England would be happy to build a wall and divorce ourselves from Scotland and lets see how they get on without us.
attributes.background:
During the last referendum the people of England and Wales never voted if we wanted to keep Scotland in the UK. I believe this is a vote for the whole country and not just Scotland.
If Scotland is so adamant about leaving the UK then maybe we should all vote.
